query:
SELECT id, analysisId, startTime, endTime, 
  CASE WHEN transcription IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(LEFT(transcription, 50), '...') ELSE NULL END as transcription_preview,
  CASE WHEN visualDescription IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(LEFT(visualDescription, 50), '...') ELSE NULL END as visual_preview
FROM timelineSegments 
ORDER BY id DESC 
LIMIT 5
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user ENKfpgkx2S962Xx.root --database NYSDZ3CUp62WRWmJyXH7Fz --execute SELECT id, analysisId, startTime, endTime, 
  CASE WHEN transcription IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(LEFT(transcription, 50), '...') ELSE NULL END as transcription_preview,
  CASE WHEN visualDescription IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(LEFT(visualDescription, 50), '...') ELSE NULL END as visual_preview
FROM timelineSegments 
ORDER BY id DESC 
LIMIT 5
